00019 #include <cassert>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/config.hpp> // for BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME
00022 
00023 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/mpl/if.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/mpl/apply.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/mpl/plus.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/mpl/int.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include <boost/type_traits/is_convertible.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/type_traits/is_base_and_derived.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/type_traits/is_pointer.hpp>
00033 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_adaptor.hpp>
00034 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_traits.hpp>
00035 #include <boost/static_assert.hpp>
00036 
00037 namespace boost { 
00038 namespace archive {
00039 namespace iterators {
00040 
00041 // poor man's tri-state
00042 struct tri_state {
00043     enum state_enum {
00044         is_false = false,
00045         is_true = true,
00046         is_indeterminant
00047     } m_state;
00048     // convert to bool
00049     operator bool (){
00050         assert(is_indeterminant != m_state);
00051         return is_true == m_state ? true : false;
00052     }
00053     // assign from bool
00054     tri_state & operator=(bool rhs) {
00055         m_state = rhs ? is_true : is_false;
00056         return *this;
00057     }
00058     tri_state(bool rhs) :
00059         m_state(rhs ? is_true : is_false)
00060     {}
00061     tri_state(state_enum state) :
00062         m_state(state)
00063     {}
00064     bool operator==(const tri_state & rhs) const {
00065         return m_state == rhs.m_state;
00066     }
00067     bool operator!=(const tri_state & rhs) const {
00068         return m_state != rhs.m_state;
00069     }
00070 };
00071 
00073 // implement functions common to dataflow iterators
00074 template<class Derived>
00075 class dataflow {
00076     bool m_eoi;
00077 protected:
00078     // test for iterator equality
00079     tri_state equal(const Derived & rhs) const {
00080         if(m_eoi && rhs.m_eoi)
00081             return true;
00082         if(m_eoi || rhs.m_eoi)
00083             return false;
00084         return tri_state(tri_state::is_indeterminant);
00085     }
00086     void eoi(bool tf){
00087         m_eoi = tf;
00088     }
00089     bool eoi() const {
00090         return m_eoi;
00091     }
00092 public:
00093     dataflow(bool tf) :
00094         m_eoi(tf)
00095     {}
00096     dataflow() : // used for iterator end
00097         m_eoi(true)
00098     {}
00099 };
00100 
00101 } // namespace iterators
00102 } // namespace archive
00103 } // namespace boost
00104 
00105 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_DATAFLOW_HPP
